name: Zotero 插件合集
description: Zotero add-on to list and install add-ons in Zotero | Zotero插件合集

name: Actions and Tags for Zotero
description: Action it, tag it, sorted.

name: Attanger for Zotero
description: Attachment Manager for Zotero

name: Awesome GPT
description: GPT Meet Zotero.

name: Better BibTex for Zotero
description: Make Zotero effective for us LaTeX holdouts

name: Better Notes for Zotero
description: Everything about note management. All in Zotero.

name: Chartero
description: Chart in Zotero

name: Crush Reference
description: PDF references add-on for Zotero.

name: DelItemWithAtt
description: Remove attachment(s) when delete the item(s) or collection in Zotero and JurisM.

name: Eaiser Citation
description: Make Zotero's citation in Word easier and clearer.

name: Ethereal Style
description: Ethereal Style for Zotero

name: Green Frog
description: Green Frog https://github.com/redleafnew/zotero-updateifs  的easyScholar数据版。更新影响因子，其他一系列工具，详见Readme

name: PMCID fetcher for Zotero
description: PMCID fetcher

name: Jasminum
description: A Zotero add-on to retrive CNKI meta data. 一个简单的Zotero 插件，用于识别中文元数据

name: KeepZotero
description: KeepZotero is a zotero plugin to keep zotero in taskbar by changing close to minimize

name: Linter for Zotero
description: Linter for Zotero. An addon for Zotero to format item metadata. Shortcut to set title rich text; set journal abbreviations, university places, and item languages, etc; detect duplicate items.

name: LyZ
description: LyZ is a plugin for Zotero, which is intended to make working with LyX/Zotero more pleasant.

name: MarkDBConnect
description: Zotero plugin that links your Markdown database to Zotero. Jump directly from Zotero Items to connected Markdown files. Automatically tags Zotero Items so you can easily see which papers you've made notes for.

name: Mdnotes for Zotero
description: A Zotero plugin to export item metadata and notes as markdown files

name: Night for Zotero
description: Night theme for Zotero UI and PDF

name: Notero
description: A Zotero plugin for syncing items and notes into Notion

name: Open PDF
description: Open PDF

name: PDF Figure
description: 一个基于 PDFFigure2 的 PDF 图表解析插件

name: Preview for Zotero
description: Preview Zotero attachments in the library view.

name: Reading List for Zotero
description: Keep track of whether you've read items in Zotero

name: Sci-Hub Plugin for Zotero
description: A plugin that will automatically download PDFs of zotero items from sci-hub

name: Sci-PDF
description: Download PDF from Sci-Hub automatically For Zotero7

name: scite Plugin for Zotero
description: scite zotero plugin

name: Storage Scanner for Zotero
description: A Zotero plugin to remove the broken & duplicate attachment link of the bibliography

name: Tara
description: A Zotero add-on for backup and restore preferences, add-ons, translators, styles, and locate between two machines

name: Translate for Zotero
description: Translate PDF, EPub, webpage, metadata, annotations, notes to the target language. Support 20+ translate services.

name: Ze-Notes
description: Zotero plugin for note management. Helping you visualize your notes and annotations efficiently.

name: Zoplicate
description: A plugin that does one thing only: Detect and manage duplicate items in Zotero.

name: ZotCard
description: ZotCard is a plug-in for Zotero, which is a card note-taking enhancement tool. It provides card templates (such as concept card, character card, golden sentence card, etc., by default, you can customize other card templates), so you can write cards quickly. In addition, it helps you sort cards and standardize card formats.

name: Zotero Better Authors
description: Customize the displayed authors list

name: Zotero Citation Counts Manager
description: Zotero plugin for auto-fetching citation counts from various sources

name: Zotero Citation Counts Manager Enhaned
description: Enhanced Citation Counts Manager for Zotero 7

name: Zotero Excalidraw
description: zotero connects to excalidraw

name: Zotero Inspire
description: Zotero plugin, fetching publication metadata and cite counts (w/ and w/o self citations) from the INSPIRE-HEP database (and CrossRef cite counts for papers in other fields)

name: Zotero OCR
description: Zotero Plugin for OCR

name: Zotero PDF Metadata
description: WIP - Updates the User PDF file metadata when title or author is changed

name: Zotero ShortDOI
description: Zotero extension to retrieve and validate DOIs and shortDOIs

name: Zotero TL;DR
description: Zotero addon to automatically fetch TL;DR from Sematic scholar for items.

name: Zotero 更新影响因子
description: 从唯问更新影响因子Update IFs from Justscience，其他一系列工具，详见Readme

name: ZotFile
description: Zotero plugin to manage your attachments: automatically rename, move, and attach PDFs (or other files) to Zotero items, sync PDFs from your Zotero library to your (mobile) PDF reader (e.g. an iPad, Android tablet, etc.), and extract PDF annotations.

name: ZoToDo
description: A Zotero plugin to make Todoist tasks for papers added to Zotero

name: Zutilo Utility for Zotero
description: Zotero plugin providing some additional editing features
